skill.name: Binning
skill.perk.mega_drops: Chance to get very rare drops.
skill.perk.double_mega_drops: Chance to get incredibly rare drops.
recycler.name: Recycler
recycler.desc: Cheaper cost to craft Recycling Machines.
recycler.pdesc: Cheaper cost to craft Recycling Machines and Advanced Recycling Machines.
environmentalist.name: Environmentalist
environmentalist.desc: Gain friendship for every {{RecyclingCountToGainFriendship}} trash recycled.
environmentalist.pdesc: Gain more friendship from every {{RecyclingCountToGainFriendship}} trash recycled.
salvager.name: Salvager
salvager.desc: Get more output from Recycling Machines.
salvager.pdesc: Get more output from Recycling Machines, Recycling Bins, and Trash Cans.
sneak.name: Sneak
sneak.desc: Decreased noise when digging through trash.
sneak.pdesc: When caught in trashcans, villagers think you are being helpful.  You can make more noise than ever.
upseller.name: Upseller
upseller.desc: Villagers never hate gifts, even trash.
upseller.pdesc: Villagers never dislike gifts, even trash.
reclaimer.name: Reclaimer
reclaimer.pdesc: +{{ReclaimerExtraValuePercent}}% and an additional {{ReclaimerPrestigeExtraValuePercent}}% value when trashing items
sneak.prestige.dialogue.child: Oh you're taking out the trash? I hate having to do that!
sneak.prestige.dialogue.teen: I see you're helping out around town. Thanks!
sneak.prestige.dialogue.adult: Wow, taking out other peoples trash, how diligent!
config.ExperienceFromCheckingRecycling.t: Experience gained from harvesting from Recycling Bins.
config.ExperienceFromComposting.tooltip: Experience gained from harvesting from Composters.
config.ExperienceFromRecycling.tooltip: Experience gained from putting trash into a Recycling Machine.
config.PerLevelBaseDropChanceBonus: Per Level Base Drop Chance Bonus
config.PerLevelBaseDropChanceBonus.toolt: Additional percent chance per level of getting a trash drop.  Stacks with base chance and daily luck.
config.PerLevelRareDropChanceBonus: Per Level Rare Drop Chance Bonus
config.PerLevelRareDropChanceBonus.toolt: Additional percent chance per level of getting certain rare trash drops.
config.MegaMinLevel.tooltip: Minimum level required to have any chance of getting 'Mega' trash drops.  In vanilla, these are drops which play the crit sound.
config.DoubleMegaMinLevel.tooltip: Minimum level required to have any chance of getting 'Double Mega' trash drops.  In vanilla, these are drops which play the explosion sound.
config.RecyclingCountToGainFriendship.to: Number of items to recycle to gain friendship when using Environmentalist profession.
config.RecyclingFriendshipGain.tooltip: Amount of friendship to gain with the community for recycling when using Environmentalist profession.
config.RecyclingPrestigeFriendshipGain.t: Amount of additional friendship to gain with the community for recycling when Environmentalist profession is prestiged.
config.NoiseReduction.tooltip: Range decrease of noise when digging through trash.
config.PrestigeNoiseIncrease.tooltip: Range increase of noise when digging through trash while prestiged.
config.ReclaimerExtraValuePercent.toolti: Extra value gained when reclaiming an item via the inventory trash when using the Reclaimer profession.
config.ReclaimerPrestigeExtraValuePercen: Additional extra value gained when reclaimer is prestiged.
